runs.comm: nicely done. Eases forward to a fuller delivery, which seems to shape away late, and blocks down to mid-on. Has hit it soft enough for a quick single
shortish and outside off, gets back in his crease and whips it to mid-on
dabs into the covers, goes off the bottom of the bat as Chibhabha meets the shortish ball half-heartedly
worked away off his pads to long leg

appeal for leg before from Bhuvi as he gets a fuller delivery to jag back in quite sharply. Catches Masakadza on the move as he was trying to defend. Hits rather high on his front pad, may have been outside the line.
back of a length on middle, pushed back at the bowler

welcome to international cricket! Off you go, says Chibhabha. Bowls full looking for swing, doesnt get enough to worry the batsman. Leans forward and lifts him firmly over long-on. Holds the pose for the photographers around. Jadhav rushes to the rookie bowler and pats him on the back
fuller delivery just outside off, chopped towards point
shy at the batsmans end and Hami M would have been gone by miles. Poor call for the single after Chibhabha dabs it into the covers. Jadhav was the man who couldnt find the mark

whoa! Thats freakishly brave. Gets on one knee to a normal-paced delivery, it would have knocked middle stump off or conked Hami M on the head. Instead its scooped over his left shoulder and sent it soaring over the long leg boundary
short of a length ball sliding well down the leg side. Mohit Sharma from mid-off has a few words of encouragement
good length ball on leg stump, nudged to square leg
fuller delivery wanders down the leg side again. Chibhabha looks for a flick over square leg. No connection. Now its the captain who runs all the way from slip to take care of his bowler
shortish on middle, worked away into the leg side for midwicket to mop up
thats a slower ball, short of a length as well. Maskadza was going for a pull, gets struck on the body and secures a leg bye into the off side
jumps down the track and looks to slash it over extra cover. Some seam movement away beats him
big inswinger from Bhuvi, and its nice and full too. Chibhabha is caught in the crease as he looks to flick. Struck in line, but it would have wandered way down leg
banged in and just outside off, Hami M had set up for a pull but doesnt go through with it
good length ball, slightly off pace. Defended to mid-on
back of a length and outside off, Hami M is waiting on his back foot and punches to extra cover
good length ball on off stump, drilled to cover point
moves away outside leg, Sandy follows the batsman and bowls nice and full too. Flicks it away to deep square leg
another scoop! This is excellent batting from Hami M. Long leg is vacant. Sandy doesnt bowl the greatest pace. Gets down on one knee, outside off and lifts it over his left shoulder
runs down the track, and ironically the slam off the straight bat or in other words orthodox cricket doesnt work. Ah, T20 cricket. Slower ball gets an inside edge to mid-on

more hair-raising moments for Hami M! But this is more Chibhabhas fault. Pushes into the covers and takes a couple of steps down as if he were looking for the single. So Masakadza responds, gets sold a dummy. But Rahane misses the direct hit
full and targeting the leg stump, thumped down to long-on
that back of the hand slower ball to start off. Gets it bang on target on off stump, Chibhabha pushes it to cover
slower ball, short that time, Chibhabha ducks under it
short, normal paced, sits up for Chibhabha to slap away through the covers. No intention to keep it down. Always wanted to lift it over the infield
clears his front leg to try and paste a good length ball through the covers. Cant get it past short cover. Rahanes been brilliant there.
fuller and slower ball outside off, Chibhabha mistimes it to short cover
waits on a back of a length delivery and slices it to point. Looks like its hit or bust batting from Zimbabwe. Chibhabha is 14 off 19, with a six and a four
good length ball on off stump, Masakadza was looking to blast it away through point. Cant beat the infield
good length ball, slower through the air as well. Hami M looks for that sweep again, but it bounces a bit more and deflects of his forearm to third man
flighted outside off, pushed into the off side
definite single there, but Hami M is nervous now. Takes a few steps, then stops, which forces Chibhabha to stop too. But the inside edged slog sweep had gone wide enough of square leg
full on off stump, punched to mid-off
goes back and pulls away past mid-on. Poor ball from Axar, its short and it sits up on this slow pitch
starts short, Hami M was waiting for the ball to turn. Waiting in place with a cut shot. But it doesnt happen. The ball goes straight on and he gets it off the bottom of the bat to deep point
short again and Chibhabha pulls to long-on
third times not the charm for Bhajji. Keeps bowling short, this ones on middle. Masakadza jumps back and heaves it over midwicket
goes back and slaps another short ball down to long-off
fired in on the pads, Chibhabha swipes it over the short fine leg fielder
good length on leg stump, Masakdaza dabs it through midwicket and hes knocked it away well enough to beat the infield but soft enough to get two before the deep fielder runs in
thats a beautiful hit. Gets forward to a flighted delivery outside off and slashes it inside out over cover
looped up on off stump, Masakadza slams it back down the ground. Well done by the bowler to get a hand on it
pushed through fast and short, short-arm pull doesnt beat the bowler on his right
good length ball on middle, Masakadza pushes it down to mid-on and finds a couple, Great running from Zimbabwe
gets down the track, looks to turn it into the leg side but has to settle for a leg bye into the covers. Was playing across the line
shortish and angled in on the stumps. Chibhabha jumps outside the line and tries to cut to the right of point. Mohit does good work, diving away

excellent take from Pandey running to his left from long-on. Chibhabha ran down the track to smash it down the ground. But he gets it off the very bottom of the bat. Too much height, not enough power. Pandey covers a lot of ground, slides as well, keeps his eyes on the prize and wins it

tosses the ball up just outside off, Hami M lunges forward to block. Gets an inside edge towards midwicket. Should have been an easy single, but the new batsman Coventry was ball-watching for a moment or two
a lot slower through the air, and gives it a lot more air after that wicket. Coventry tries to sweep from outside off. but cant get bat to it
pushed through on off stump, Coventry nudges it to short midwicket
slog sweep sails over deep midwicket. Hit with the turn, picked the length ball, got a good stride forward. Lovely work against spin
flighted on off stump, driven to long-on to retain strike
waits on a good length ball and tickles it around the corner to short fine leg
hes been sweeping quite well. But with pace off the ball, and him getting under the ball a bit too much, Hami M has guided the ball down the throat of short fine leg
good length ball on off stump, sliced to point
leans forward to a tossed up ball on middle and drives it through the covers
length ball on off stump, Coventry works it away to long-on
through him! Thats the arm ball from Axar. Skids through before Chigumbura knew what was happening, middle pole out of the ground
good length ball on off stump, Coventry looks to nudge it towards midwicket. No run there

pushes him back with a good length ball, Coventry pushes it down the ground looking for long-on. Bhajji gets across, Rahane was moving to his left from short midwicket as well. Didnt look like a single was on offer, until Bhajji palms the ball away to where Rahane had originally been
stays back to a flatter delivery on off stump and clips it behind square leg
tossed up outside off, Coventry goes for the reverse sweep and is soundly beaten Too full, too close to off stump
pops a simple little catch to short midwicket. Its a short ball, he could have picked his spot. But instead he forgets to keep the flick down and throws it away
tossed up from around the wicket, Ervine is forward with a defensive bat
good length ball, that seems to skid onto the bat after pitching. Raza manages to bring down the open face quick enough to get off strike
back of a length and outside off, worked away to deep midwicket
offcutter on off stump, Ervine defends
pins him on the crease and strikes him on the front pad rather low too. But I think this pitched outside leg. Again Binny was getting the ball to skid onto the batsman
shortish and outside off, sliced down to third man
good length ball on off stump, defended into the covers
pushed through on middle and leg, Raza tries to pick it away through midwicket. Cant strike the bal well enough
shortish and outside off, Raza moves away and late cuts the ball to short third man
good length ball on middle, punched to long-off
goes back to a  ball he should have been forward to and then just about stops it.
pushed through on off stump, Raza defends off the back foot again
turns across the width of the batsman and the keeper didnt move behind the stumps. Uthappa was blinded, though
tossed up just outside off, he advances down the track and nearly pops a catch to Bhajji. Lovely bowling

ooh, was there an edge there? Binny thinks so. Very difficult chance if it was considering Ervine was forward, across and was looking for a scoop. Uthappa cant see the ball again and does well to keep is body behind it
good length ball just outside off, defended
moves wide of the crease does Binny and the fuller ball on off stump is driven to long-off

terrific work from Mohit! Had one stump to aim at from deep midwicket, was put under pressure by the batsman going for a couple. He was throwing off balance as well. But despite all that he hits his mark and finds Ervine well short. Originally seemed a pretty neat flick, got it past the infield and had hit it soft enough that the second run was on. Then enter Mohit
short and he pulls strongly to deep square leg
full on off stump, Raza whips it to long-on
good length ball outside off, Raza was looking to slice it away behind point. Connects with fresh air
good length ball outside off, pushed through to deep point
banged in short and Raza swats it away to deep square leg. Wonder if Zimbabwe have shifted priorities to lasting the 20 overs
full toss outside off, slapped past short cover but not past mid-off
short, slower ball outside off. Doesnt bounce anywhere near Raza wanted it to as he set up for the pull. Missed
think there was a glove there? Its not called a wide so maybe there was contact. It was another slower short ball, Raza appeared like he had adjusted better to play the pull, but still cant time it
pushed through on leg stump, he sweeps it down to short fine leg
down the track for the flatter delivery and punches to cover... I have a feeling Uthappa was saying Hard wicket to bat on to the batsman there
shortish and outside off, slashed to short third man
fuller delivery, jumps down the track and drives it back to the bowler
pushed through on middle and leg, nudged behind square leg

made his intentions a bit too early by running down the track. Axar bowls the flatter ball, cramps Raza, who tries to defend. Offers a gap between bat and pad, the ball hurtles through and knocks leg stump
fuller delivery on middle and leg, whipped away to deep midwicket
takes the length ball from from outside off and works it through midwicket
shortish and outside off, a little too far away for the umpires liking... but I thought that was almost on the wide line
low full toss on off stump, drilled to mid-off who nails the stumps as well
back of a length and outside off, slapped to cover
slower ball, on a length, clipped away to long leg
good length ball outside off, slice and miss

full and a shade outside off. Creamer was looking to paddle it around the corner. Weathers a very tight leg before appeal. Moved quite a way across and was struck on the back leg. But even that had gone outside off

goes short, Utseya was into the pull way too early. Gets an inside edge, then has to get on his bike. Cover, Rahane, was quick to the ball, whips around to throw at the right end too. But Utseya dives and does well at the bowlers end

thats a slower, short ball outside off. Cremer goes for a slog, sucked into the shot way too early. Mohit and the keeper were absolutely certain there was a bottom edge there. They look absolutely bemused that umpire Tiffin doesnt give it
instant relief for Mohit. Its the fuller, slower ball on off stump. Cremer goes for the slog too early. Misses. Bowler hits
full on leg stump, worked away to long leg
short ball, doesnt rise again. Utseya goes for a pull and is soundly beaten
full and looking for the blockhole, driven to long-on
length ball, heaved away over Bhajjis head at long-on. Just over mind. Finally a little bit of intent from Zimbabwe
tapped down the ground to long-on
shortish and outside off, Madziva moves away to open up the off side. But the slash through point doesnt connect
fuller delivery on off stump, defended behind point
thumped to the square leg boundary as Utseya gets down on one-knee and slog sweeps the length ball away
starts with a short one as he spots the tailender running down the track. the lack of pace, both from him and the deck, allows Madziva to hoick the ball over midwicket
full and angled down leg, because Madziva was making room again. Doesnt quite succeed in cramping the batsman up. Sweet drive down the ground past mid-off

another short ball as hes worried about the tailended running down the track again. Madziva slaps it over mid-off again. Pat on the back from the captain again for Sandy. Given away 34 runs in less than three overs
wide yorker, to flummox the batsman clearing his front leg and looking to slam it over the off side. Has to let it go because hed made way too much room
nails the yorker outside off again. Beats Madziva for pace
jumps down the track, beaten by the yorker outside off as well. Three dot balls to end the over and Sandeep has a broad smile on his face. Good finish at least
